content:
Process Prototyping and Performance Support

  • Incrementally enacting partially specified process model instances to evaluate process presentation scenarios by process users

  • Effective enabler for eliciting user feedback

  • Basis for user empowerment in controlling design and improvement of processes

  • Performance support (JIT training) materials can be automatically generated

  • Not yet supported by DES and SD packages
